item.title: Brief Intro to Hardware Attacks
item.description: Introduction to Bluetooth 1. What is Bluetooth? Wireless technology standard for short-distance data transfer. Operates in the ISM band from 2.402 GHz to 2.480 GHz. Named after King Harald Bluetooth, unifying Denmark and Norway. Widely adopted for its flexibility and ease of use. 2. Bluetooth Functionality: Pairing Process: Discovery: Devices broadcast presence. Pairing Request: Devices find each other. Authentication: Devices authenticate using a shared secret (link key). Piconets: Collection of connected devices (1 main, up to 7 clients).
